WRITING.TEXT: I honestly kind of like them...very minimalistic. But the new Aero blur would be beautiful as well.

WRITING.TITLE: Does anyone else just genuinely hate him/her self?

WRITING.TEXT: It's still Windows 10, either way. I just thought the Defender app and my desktop wallpaper went especially well together. :)
I think that design choice may be up to the app (in this case Spotify) developers, not Microsoft.

WRITING.TITLE: I personally think Windows 10 is shaping up rather beautifully.

WRITING.TEXT: For a tasty twist on the traditional formula, try Rishi's [Earl Grey Lavender](http://www.amazon.com/Rishi-Tea-Earl-Lavender-Ounce/dp/B00AR6LZR4/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8qid=1431149338sr=8-1keywords=rishi+earl+grey+lavender) or Ambessa's [Earl of Harlem](http://www.amazon.com/Harney-Sons-Ambessa-Harlem-Sachets/dp/B00ARKQ1YC/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8qid=1431149294sr=8-1keywords=earl+of+harlem)
